title: Clipped
description: In the beginning, God and Satan were lovers. Now, angels, demons, and mortals battle to survive the epic post-breakup drama.Satan and his army of demons are man's only hope...Â The demon Kinzer and his lover, Janka, have been sent by Satan to spy on the Raze, a gang of rogue demons who are working with God to bring about Armageddon. When someone exposes their true allegiances, the Raze clips Kinzer's wings and murders Janka. Kinzer manages to escape. He tracks down Satan's allies to warn them about a mole in their midst when he learns that they've located the Antichrist--a powerful weapon that could prevent the apocalypse. Now, he's on a mission to protect the Antichrist and avenge his lover's death.
author: Devon McCormack
